mapper.select: select id, parent_id, `order`, label, comment from ieltsnote.reading_material_category order by if(ISNULL(`order`), 0, `order`) asc, label

select id, category , title , content , embedded_resource, external_link, `translation` , question , answer , comment , creator , create_time , update_time from ieltsnote.reading_material_article ra where ra.category = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into ieltsnote.reading_material_article (category, title, content, embedded_resource, external_link, `translation`, question, answer, comment, creator, create_time) values( #{category}, #{title}, #{content}, #{embeddedResource}, #{externalLink}, #{translation}, #{question}, #{answer}, #{comment}, #{creator}, NOW() )
mapper.select: select count(distinct article_id) article_cnt, DATE_FORMAT(log_time, '%Y-%m-%d') practice_day from ieltsnote.reading_material_log sl where creator = #{creator} group by practice_day
mapper.update: update ieltsnote.reading_material_article set content = #{content}, update_time = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
